channel.title: Rune317, The RuneScape Kingdom(based on RuneSource)
channel.description:
[CENTER][B]Rune317[/B][/CENTER] [B]Introduction[/B]
Rune317 is based on RuneSource by blakeman8192.
We're aiming for a clean code for everything, e.g skills will be handled through xml files which will be looking like:
[code] <fish> <definitionId>1</definitionId> <fishSpot>309</fishSpot> <reqLevel>30</reqLevel> <reqEquip>309</reqEquip> <reqBait>314</reqBait> <anim>621</anim> <fishId>331</fishId> <fishXP>70</fishXP> <secondClick>false</secondClick> </fish> [/code]
[B]Credits[/B]
[ul][*]Developers [list] [*][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/infexis/"]Infexis[/URL] [*][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/arrowzftw/"]arrowzftw[/URL] [/list][/ul]
[ul][*]Main Credits [list] [*][URL=http://www.moparisthebest.com/blakeman8192"]blakeman8192[/URL] [/list][/ul]
[ul][*]All our information comes from RuneScape and following: [list] [*][URL=http://"http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/RuneScape_Wiki"]RuneScape Wiki[/URL] [/list][/ul]
[B]Updates Log[/B]
[B]06/02[/B]
Fishing and Firemaking started
[B]Media[/B]
[IMG]http://puu.sh/yCLl[/img]
[b]Fishing[/b]
[ul][*]Item requirements [*]Correct Animations [*]All fishes are catch-able[/ul]

item.title: Rune317, The RuneScape Kingdom(based on RuneSource)
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Fexis, post:8, topic:443588”]Recently got introduced into xml loading files.

Now converting the skills and loading them all from xml files.

The definitions:

    <FishingDefinition>
        <definitionId>5</definitionId>
        <name>Shark</name>
        <npcId>312</npcId>
        <fishId>383</fishId>
        <reqItems>311</reqItems>
        <reqBait>-1</reqBait>
        <reqLevel>76</reqLevel>
        <xp>110</xp>
        <anim>618</anim>
    </FishingDefinition>

[quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=546268.msg4004756#msg4004756 date=1338498152]

[quote author=Fexis link=topic=546268.msg4004676#msg4004676 date=1338491214]

Are you using different clients in the pictures…?
[/quote]Yes I am, took the pictures under server media before the client updated.

K, now show us the map bugs.
[/quote]Obviously there are map bugs etc… but I havn’t done much client sided yet than loading the newer data.[/quote]

Dw, I already see plenty in your dung pic.

edit:


9hLTO.png807×633

tell me more about how your maps wont look like this.

Read full topic
item.source: Rune317, The RuneScape Kingdom(based on RuneSource)

item.title: Rune317, The RuneScape Kingdom(based on RuneSource)
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:9, topic:443588”]ew fugly mix[/quote]Wasn’t really thinking about mixing those two. I want to be able to do more content server side, otherwise I’m limited to 317 maps, this way I can do much more.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune317, The RuneScape Kingdom(based on RuneSource)
item.dc:creator: @Fexis Fexis
item.description:
@Fexis wrote:

[CENTER]Rune317[/CENTER]
Introduction

Rune317 is based on RuneSource by blakeman8192.

We’re aiming for a clean code for everything, e.g skills will be handled through xml files which will be looking like:

    <fish>
	    <definitionId>1</definitionId>
	    <fishSpot>309</fishSpot>
	    <reqLevel>30</reqLevel>
	    <reqEquip>309</reqEquip>
	    <reqBait>314</reqBait>
	    <anim>621</anim>
	    <fishId>331</fishId>
	    <fishXP>70</fishXP>
	    <secondClick>false</secondClick>
    </fish>

Credits

[list]
[]Infexis
[*]arrowzftw
[/list][/ul]

[ul][]Main Credits
[list]
[]blakeman8192
[/list][/ul]

[ul][]All our information comes from RuneScape and following:
[list]
[]RuneScape Wiki
[/list][/ul]

06/02

Fishing and Firemaking started

[]Correct Animations
[*]All fishes are catch-able[/ul]
